channel.title: Changing the title of a client
channel.description: well i downloaded the project Satan client, and i think its totaly amazing and i was going to edit it and make it in to a projectR4 client(my server) and i was told that all the text is in the client.java but when i search for the title in there it comes up with nothing? and suggestions on where it may be? (and don't call me a noob i have never done a client before, so if you gonna be like "OMG what a noob he can't even edit a clients name!" then fuck off and don't bother posting! :mad:) but seriously and help would be amazing :D regards LORDZAMORAK

item.title: Changing the title of a client

item.description:
@LordZamorak wrote:

thanks all of you:D you guys are the best

Read full topic

@Your_Master wrote:

Sorry, i made a big mistake, im sorry. It will never happens again.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the title of a client

item.title: Changing the title of a client
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Your Master:

Dude, right click the client, press edit then there is a called ‘‘title’’ then to right of it there is a text, delete it and write your own text. Learn more about clients, before using them dude.

What are you talking about?

On Topic: Go to your Frame_Sub1 class, and search for -

setTitle

You should see this -

setTitle("NAME");

Just change “NAME” to your client name. (Keep the quotation marks.)

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the title of a client

item.title: Changing the title of a client
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

Oh sorry, i didn’t know that.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the title of a client

item.title: Changing the title of a client
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Your Master:

Dude, right click the client, press edit then there is a called ‘‘title’’ then to right of it there is a text, delete it and write your own text. Learn more about clients, before using them dude.

I don’t think that’s what he meant…

The text you see on the client frame and the text you see loading the client are found in:

Frame_Sub1 class
client class
and POSSIBLY the EGUI class.

Read full topic
